contract.name: DepositDemo
abi: event RoleAdminChanged(bytes32 indexed role, bytes32 indexed previousAdminRole, bytes32 indexed newAdminRole)
event RoleGranted(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event RoleRevoked(bytes32 indexed role, address indexed account, address indexed sender)
event SetupDeposit(bytes32 dlcUUID, uint256 btcDeposit, uint256 index, string[] attestorList, address owner)
event StatusUpdate(uint256 loanid, bytes32 dlcUUID, uint8 newStatus)
function deposits(uint256) view returns (uint256 id, bytes32 dlcUUID, uint8 status, uint256 depositAmount, address owner, string btcTxId)
function getAllDepositsForAddress(address _addy) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, bytes32 dlcUUID, string[] attestorList, uint8 status, uint256 depositAmount, address owner, string btcTxId)[])
function getDeposit(uint256 _depositID) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, bytes32 dlcUUID, string[] attestorList, uint8 status, uint256 depositAmount, address owner, string btcTxId))
function getDepositByUUID(bytes32 _uuid) view returns (tuple(uint256 id, bytes32 dlcUUID, string[] attestorList, uint8 status, uint256 depositAmount, address owner, string btcTxId))
function hasRole(bytes32 role, address account) view returns (bool)
function setupDeposit(uint256 btcDeposit, uint8 attestorCount) returns (uint256)
